name: Slime Workout
description:
SLIME WORKOUT

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

3D Isometric Puzzle-game developed during Global Game Jam 2021

The slime has a peculiar way of gaining and loosing weight, when it jumps it looses a piece while moving to an other slime it merges with it. 

In each level the slime must all the tiles that required a specific weight.

Controls

WASD to move

SPACE to jump
